verses.verse: <S%G3326>After<s%> these <S%G5023>things,<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5319>revealed<s%> <S%G1438>himself<s%> <S%G3825>again<s%> to the <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G1909>at<s%> the <S%G2281>sea<s%> of <S%G5085>Tiberias.<s%> <S%G1161><s%> <S%G5319>He<s%> revealed himself this <S%G3779>way.<s%>

<S%G4613>Simon<s%> <S%G4074>Peter,<s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G2381>Thomas<s%> <S%G3004>called<s%> <S%G1324>Didymus,<s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3482>Nathanael<s%> <S%G575>of<s%> <S%G2580>Cana<s%> in <S%G1056>Galilee,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> sons of <S%G2199>Zebedee,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G243>others<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G2258>were<s%> <S%G3674>together.<s%>

<S%G4613>Simon<s%> <S%G4074>Peter<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to <S%G846>them,<s%> <S%G5217>"I<s%>'m going <S%G232>fishing.<s%>" They <S%G3004>told<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G2249>"We<s%> are <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G2064>coming<s%> <S%G4862>with<s%> <S%G4671>you.<s%>" They <S%G2117>immediately<s%> went <S%G1831>out,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G305>entered<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G4143>boat.<s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G1722><s%> <S%G1565>That<s%> <S%G3571>night,<s%> they <S%G4084>caught<s%> <S%G3762>nothing.<s%>

But <S%G1161>when<s%> <S%G4405>day<s%> had <S%G2235>already<s%> <S%G1096>come,<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2476>stood<s%> <S%G1519>on<s%> the <S%G123>beach,<s%> <S%G3305>yet<s%> the <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G3756>didn't<s%> <S%G1492>know<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> it <S%G2076>was<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus.<s%>

<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to <S%G846>them,<s%> <S%G3813>"Children,<s%> have <S%G2192>you<s%> <S%G3361><s%> <S%G5100>anything<s%> to <S%G4371>eat?<s%>" They <S%G611>answered<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G3756>"No.<s%>"

<S%G1161>He<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> to <S%G846>them,<s%> <S%G906>"Cast<s%> the <S%G1350>net<s%> <S%G1519>on<s%> the <S%G1188>right<s%> <S%G3313>side<s%> of the <S%G4143>boat,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> you will <S%G2147>find<s%> <S%G906>some.<s%>" They cast it <S%G3767>therefore,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2089>now<s%> they <S%G2480>weren't<s%> <S%G3756><s%> <S%G2480>able<s%> to <S%G1670>draw<s%> <S%G846>it<s%> in <S%G575>for<s%> the <S%G4128>multitude<s%> of <S%G2486>fish.<s%>

<S%G1565>That<s%> <S%G3101>disciple<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G25>loved<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to <S%G4074>Peter,<s%> <S%G2076>"It<s%>'s the <S%G2962>Lord!<s%>" So <S%G3767>when<s%> <S%G4613>Simon<s%> <S%G4074>Peter<s%> <S%G191>heard<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> it <S%G2076>was<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> he <S%G1241>wrapped<s%> his <S%G1903>coat<s%> around <S%G1063>him<s%> (for he <S%G2258>was<s%> <S%G1131>naked<s%>), <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G906>threw<s%> <S%G1438>himself<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G2281>sea.<s%>

<S%G1161>But<s%> the <S%G243>other<s%> <S%G3101>disciples<s%> came <S%G2064>in<s%> the little <S%G4142>boat<s%> <S%G1063>(for<s%> they <S%G2258>were<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G3112>far<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> the <S%G1093>land,<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G5613><s%> <S%G575>about<s%> two <S%G1250>hundred<s%> <S%G4083>cubits<s%> <S%G4951>away<s%>), dragging the <S%G1350>net<s%> full of <S%G2486>fish.<s%>

<S%G5613>So<s%> <S%G3767>when<s%> they got <S%G576>out<s%> <S%G1519>on<s%> the <S%G1093>land,<s%> they <S%G991>saw<s%> a fire of <S%G439>coals<s%> <S%G2749>there,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3795>fish<s%> laid <S%G1945>on<s%> <S%G2532>it,<s%> and <S%G740>bread.<s%>

<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to <S%G846>them,<s%> <S%G5342>"Bring<s%> some <S%G575>of<s%> the <S%G3795>fish<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> you <S%G4084>have<s%> <S%G3568>just<s%> <S%G4084>caught.<s%>"

<S%G4613>Simon<s%> <S%G4074>Peter<s%> went <S%G305>up,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1670>drew<s%> the <S%G1350>net<s%> <S%G1909>to<s%> <S%G1093>land,<s%> <S%G3324>full<s%> of <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G2486>fish,<s%> one <S%G1540>hundred<s%> <S%G4004>fifty-three;<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> even though there <S%G5607>were<s%> so <S%G5118>many,<s%> the <S%G1350>net<s%> <S%G4977>wasn't<s%> <S%G3756><s%> <S%G4977>torn.<s%>

<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to <S%G846>them,<s%> <S%G1205>"Come<s%> and eat <S%G709>breakfast.<s%>" <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3762>None<s%> of the <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G5111>dared<s%> <S%G1833>inquire<s%> of <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G5101>"Who<s%> <S%G1488>are<s%> <S%G4771>you?<s%>" <S%G1492>knowing<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> it <S%G2076>was<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord.<s%>

<S%G3767>Then<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2983>took<s%> the <S%G740>bread,<s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G1325>gave<s%> it to <S%G846>them,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G3795>fish<s%> <S%G3668>likewise.<s%>

<S%G5124>This<s%> is <S%G2235>now<s%> the third <S%G5154>time<s%> that <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> was <S%G5319>revealed<s%> to <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3101>disciples,<s%> after he had <S%G1453>risen<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> the <S%G3498>dead.<s%>

<S%G3767>So<s%> <S%G3753>when<s%> they had eaten their <S%G709>breakfast,<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to <S%G4613>Simon<s%> <S%G4074>Peter,<s%> <S%G4613>"Simon,<s%> son of <S%G2495>Jonah,<s%> do <S%G25>you<s%> love <S%G3165>me<s%> more <S%G4119>than<s%> <S%G5130>these?<s%>" He <S%G3004>said<s%> to <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G3483>"Yes,<s%> <S%G2962>Lord;<s%> <S%G4771>you<s%> <S%G1492>know<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> I have <S%G5368>affection<s%> for <S%G4571>you.<s%>" He <S%G3004>said<s%> to <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G1006>"Feed<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G5130>lambs.<s%>"

He <S%G3004>said<s%> to <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G3825>again<s%> a second <S%G1208>time,<s%> <S%G4613>"Simon,<s%> son of <S%G2495>Jonah,<s%> do <S%G25>you<s%> love <S%G3165>me?<s%>" He <S%G3004>said<s%> to <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G3483>"Yes,<s%> <S%G2962>Lord;<s%> <S%G4771>you<s%> <S%G1492>know<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> I have <S%G5368>affection<s%> for <S%G4571>you.<s%>" He <S%G3004>said<s%> to <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G4165>"Tend<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G4263>sheep.<s%>"

He <S%G3004>said<s%> to <S%G846>him<s%> the third <S%G5154>time,<s%> <S%G4613>"Simon,<s%> son of <S%G2495>Jonah,<s%> do <S%G5368>you<s%> have affection for <S%G3165>me?<s%>" <S%G4074>Peter<s%> was <S%G3076>grieved<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> he <S%G2036>asked<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> the third <S%G5154>time,<s%> "Do <S%G5368>you<s%> have affection for <S%G3165>me?<s%>" <S%G2532>He<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> to <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G2962>"Lord,<s%> <S%G4771>you<s%> <S%G1492>know<s%> <S%G3956>everything.<s%> <S%G4771>You<s%> <S%G1097>know<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> I have <S%G5368>affection<s%> for <S%G4571>you.<s%>" <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G1006>"Feed<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G4263>sheep.<s%>

<S%G281>Most<s%> <S%G281>certainly<s%> I <S%G3004>tell<s%> <S%G4671>you,<s%> <S%G3753>when<s%> you <S%G2258>were<s%> <S%G3501>young,<s%> you <S%G2224>dressed<s%> <S%G4572>yourself,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> walked <S%G3699>where<s%> you <S%G2309>wanted<s%> <S%G1161>to.<s%> But <S%G3752>when<s%> you are <S%G1095>old,<s%> you will stretch <S%G1614>out<s%> <S%G4675>your<s%> <S%G5495>hands,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G243>another<s%> will <S%G2224>dress<s%> <S%G4571>you,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5342>carry<s%> <S%G4571>you<s%> <S%G3699>where<s%> you <S%G3756>don't<s%> want to <S%G2309>go.<s%>"

Now <S%G2036>he<s%> said <S%G5124>this,<s%> <S%G4591>signifying<s%> by <S%G4169>what<s%> kind of <S%G2288>death<s%> he would <S%G1392>glorify<s%> <S%G2316>God.<s%> <S%G2532>When<s%> he had <S%G2036>said<s%> <S%G5124>this,<s%> he <S%G3004>said<s%> to <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G190>"Follow<s%> <S%G3427>me.<s%>"

<S%G1161>Then<s%> <S%G4074>Peter,<s%> turning <S%G1994>around,<s%> <S%G991>saw<s%> a <S%G3101>disciple<s%> <S%G190>following.<s%> This was the <S%G3101>disciple<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> sincerely <S%G25>loved,<s%> the <S%G1909>one<s%> <S%G5101>who<s%> had <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G377>leaned<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%>' <S%G4738>breast<s%> <S%G1722>at<s%> the <S%G1173>supper<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2036>asked,<s%> <S%G2962>"Lord,<s%> <S%G3588>who<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> going to betray <S%G4571>You?<s%>"

<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G1437>"If<s%> I desire <S%G2309>that<s%> <S%G846>he<s%> <S%G3306>stay<s%> <S%G2193>until<s%> I <S%G2064>come,<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> is that <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G4571>you?<s%> <S%G4771>You<s%> <S%G190>follow<s%> <S%G3427>me.<s%>"

<S%G3778>This<s%> <S%G3056>saying<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G1831>went<s%> <S%G1831>out<s%> <S%G1519>among<s%> the <S%G80>brothers,<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G1565>this<s%> <S%G3101>disciple<s%> <S%G599>wouldn't<s%> <S%G3756><s%> <S%G599>die.<s%> <S%G2532>Yet<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3756>didn't<s%> <S%G2036>say<s%> <S%G3754><s%> to <S%G846>him<s%> that he <S%G599>wouldn't<s%> <S%G3756><s%> <S%G599>die,<s%> <S%G235>but,<s%> <S%G1437>"If<s%> I desire <S%G2309>that<s%> <S%G846>he<s%> <S%G3306>stay<s%> <S%G2193>until<s%> I <S%G2064>come,<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> is that <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G4571>you?<s%>"

<S%G3778>This<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> the <S%G3101>disciple<s%> <S%G3588>who<s%> <S%G3140>testifies<s%> <S%G4012>about<s%> these <S%G5130>things,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1125>wrote<s%> these <S%G5023>things.<s%> <S%G2532>We<s%> <S%G1492>know<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3141>witness<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G227>true.<s%>

<S%G1161>There<s%> <S%G2076>are<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> other <S%G243>things<s%> <S%G3745>which<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G4160>did,<s%> <S%G3748>which<s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> they would <S%G2596>all<s%> <S%G1520><s%> be <S%G1125>written,<s%> I suppose <S%G3633>that<s%> even the <S%G2889>world<s%> <S%G846>itself<s%> <S%G5562>wouldn't<s%> <S%G3761><s%> have <S%G5562>room<s%> for the <S%G975>books<s%> that would be <S%G1125>written.<s%>
